While it does have a distinctive taste, it is not as zesty as some other beverages like soda with natural flavors or carbonated drinks with intense artificial flavors. It has a recognizable taste but is not overly strong or complex. Considering the balance of its taste, I would place it closer to the zesty side of the spectrum, but not too far. Therefore, I would say it is around 50.
